Grouped_Utterances: I’d like to talk more about my work anxiety. I still feel a bit overwhelmed.

Yes, I wrote about our beach trips and how she always made me laugh. I feel a mix of happiness and sadness, but it’s nice to remember her in a positive light. Yes, actually. I had a presentation at work, and I felt really nervous leading up to it. I think it’s the constant deadlines and the fear of not meeting expectations.

I feel a bit more relaxed, actually.
I went out with friends afterward for dinner. It was nice to unwind.

A little bit. I still feel anxious sometimes, but I can manage it better now. I think writing helps, and having those breathing techniques makes me feel more in control. Surprisingly well! I think my preparation paid off. Yeah, it felt good to succeed at something I was worried about. Yes, we had a meeting, and she was really understanding. We talked about prioritizing my tasks better. It felt reassuring. I didn’t expect her to be so supportive. I feel less overwhelmed because I can see everything laid out. It’s easier to manage.

I’ve been trying to use the deep breathing techniques more, especially when I feel overwhelmed. I tried to practice deep breathing and remind myself that I was prepared. I’ve started using a planner to keep track of deadlines and break tasks into smaller steps. Yes, I’d like to learn more about mindfulness or meditation.

I think I’ll keep using the planner. It’s been helpful. Yes, I think I can do that. I’m glad to hear that! Let’s plan to meet again next week to check on your progress. Keep practicing those techniques, and don’t hesitate to reach out if you need anything.
